languages.text: "Сожалею, что вызвал ваше неодобрение, Лорд-инквизитор. Я сделаю выводы из этой ошибки. Эмелина... более не представляет угрозы. Я проследил за этим".
"I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."
languages.original_text: "Сожалею, что вызвал ваше неодобрение, Лорд-инквизитор. Я сделаю выводы из этой ошибки. Эмелина... более не представляет угрозы. Я проследил за этим".

traits.locale_text: "I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."
"I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."
"I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."
"I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."
"I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジター、失望させてしまい申し訳ありません。この誤ちは繰り返しません。エメリナは…もはや脅威ではありません。我はそれを目の当たりにしました」
languages.original_text: "I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジター、失望させてしまい申し訳ありません。この誤ちは繰り返しません。エメリナは…もはや脅威ではありません。我はそれを目の当たりにしました」

languages.text: “我很抱歉招致这样的结果，大审判官大人。我会从这个错误中吸取教训。至于艾米莉娜……她已经不再是威胁了，我已经处理好了。”
languages.original_text: "I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉招致这样的结果，审判长大人。我会从这个错误中吸取教训。至于艾米莉娜……她已经不再是威胁了，我已经处理好了。”

languages.text: « Je regrette d'avoir suscité votre désapprobation, seigneur inquisiteur. J'apprendrai de cette erreur. Emelina... n'est plus une menace. Je m'en suis assuré. »
languages.original_text: "I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."

traits.locale_text: « Je regrette d'avoir suscité votre désapprobation, seigneur inquisiteur. J'apprendrai de cette erreur. Emelina... n'est plus une menace. Je m'en suis assuré. »

languages.text: «Lamento haber merecido su reproche, Lord Inquisidor. Aprenderé de mi error. Emelina... ya no es una amenaza. Me he ocupado de ello».
languages.original_text: "I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento haber merecido su reproche, Lord Inquisidor. Aprenderé de mi error. Emelina... ya no es una amenaza. Me he ocupado de ello».

languages.text: "Ich nehme Eure Rüge mit Bedauern zur Kenntnis, Lord Inquisitor. Ich werde aus diesem Fehler lernen. Emelina ... ist keine Bedrohung mehr. Dafür habe ich gesorgt."
languages.original_text: "I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme Eure Rüge mit Bedauern zur Kenntnis, Lord Inquisitor. Ich werde aus diesem Fehler lernen. Emelina ... ist keine Bedrohung mehr. Dafür habe ich gesorgt."

languages.text: "Bağışlayın Lord Engizisyoncu. Bu hatamdan ders çıkaracağım. Emelina... Artık tehdit teşkil etmiyor. İcabına baktım."
languages.original_text: "I regret incurring your disapproval, Lord Inquisitor. I will learn from this mistake. Emelina... no longer poses a threat. I have seen to it."
